## RACI Example
[Create a simple RACI matrix for 2-3 key activities this role participates in]

| Activity | [This Role] | [Other Role 1] | [Other Role 2] |

| [Activity 1] | R/A | C | I |
| [Activity 2] | C | R/A | I |

**Legend:** R = Responsible, A = Accountable, C = Consulted, I = Informed
